info.brief_description: You gain the ability to permanently swap each body part (once per part) with someone else.
info.description:
Your name is Kyle Long (18) and your family owns an apartment building. One day you are granted the ability to swap body parts with other people by putting on their clothing. You can only swap a particular body part once and only using the particular clothing for that body part (If you put on a woman's shirt you get their torso minus their breasts. To get their breasts you need to put on their bra or bikini top, etc.). Everyone can notice of whatever swaps happen and once you have swapped every body part you must live as whatever kind of person you wound up with.

Your Family:
Kenneth Long: Father, 44, owner, manager and superintendent of the apartment building
Patricia Long-Smith: Mother, 42, works as assistant manager at a restaurant down the street
Felicity Smith: Sister, 21, attends college in the city, doesn't like your and her father so she uses mother's maiden name. She doesn't mind you and ignores Alice.
Alice Long: Sister, 17, goes to the same highschool as you do. She can't stand Felicity and prefers hanging out with you.

Some Tenants:
Mrs. Agatha Peel: 39, A Widow and your mother's best friend. She works as a pharmacist across the street from the apartment building.
Miss Jennifer Henderson: 22, A University Student and rival of your sister Felicity. She is studying business management and operates the gym in the building for the other tenants as a job.
Miss Tia Ben: 21, Works as a Hairstylist and hopes to become a stylist for the movie industry. She is Felicity's best friend and Jennifer's roommate.

People from School:
Christie Clark: 18, School Council President and most popular girl in school. You dated her once in middle school before she became popular but dumped her once you discovered how much of a control freak she is (No one has dared dump her since).
Penny Loav: 17, Alice's best friend and your long time crush (the only big secret you keep from Alice). She is very smart and wears glasses which other kids make fun of her for but is otherwise quite pretty.
Mrs. Nancy Petal: 31, The School's drama teacher. She is very strict when she has to teach non-drama classes but is super nice to drama students (Unfortunately you have her for english only).

Your Friends:
Henry Drommel: 18, Your best friend since you were a toddler. Has a crush on your older sister Felicity.
Michelle Drommel: 20, Henry's older sister. She secretly has a crush on you but is too shy to act on it.
Marsha Liu: 17, your ex-girlfriend but still good friend (She broke up with you when she discovered your crush on Penny Loav). She is on your school's swim team (as the only girl on the team) and is expecting to get a swimming scholarship when she graduates.

Basic Rules:
1. No killing the main character
2. No personality changes
3. Try to keep good grammar
4. No swapping a part more than once
5. Do not end the story

Extra notes:
- To get a neck and voice swap things like: neck bands, necklaces, scarves, Turtleneck sweaters, Collared shirts and hooded clothing work (only if the hood is put over your head).
- To get the face to swap, things like glasses, hoods, wide brim hats work

I hope you enjoy the story and feel free to add chapters!
